GP12skp031pu:2697: jagāma puṇyāṃ lokeṣu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ prabhuḥ // SkP_26.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2698: tatrāsau darśanaṃ svapne nāpitāya dadau gaṇaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2699: maṇḍūkākṣāya rūpaṃ ca svaṃ tasyādarśayattadā // SkP_26.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2704: sthāpayasva ca tatrārcāṃ madrūpasadṛśīṃ śubhām // SkP_26.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2705: vittaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi putrānsaubhāgyameva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2706: priyatvaṃ caiva sarvatra gatiṃ cānuttamāṃ punaḥ // SkP_26.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2715: tasya pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāvartayata śobhanām /
GP12skp031pu:2716: gaṇeśasya mahāsattvaḥ sa ca tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata // SkP_26.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2717: sa tasmai karmaṇā tena vittaṃ yadyatsamīhitam /
GP12skp031pu:2718: paśūṃścaiva hi putrāṃśca saubhāgyaṃ cādadatprabhuḥ // SkP_26.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2720: ārirādhayiṣurlokast asya pūjāṃ cakāra ha // SkP_26.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2722: homaṃ japyaṃ tathaivānye pūjāṃ cānye varārthinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2725: dadau sarvānabhiprāyān ye ye teṣāmabhīpsitāḥ // SkP_26.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2726: evaṃ taṃ kāmadaṃ jñātvā divodāso nṛpastadā /
GP12skp031pu:2730: saivamuktā tadā gatvā gaṇeśaṃ prāpya śobhanā /
GP12skp031pu:2733: tāvanna bhokṣye yāvanme varo 'dattastvayā prabho // SkP_26.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2734: jāte ca putre dāsyāmi śatānāṃ daśatīrdaśa /
GP12skp031pu:2737: kṣīrasya pañcagavyasya kariṣye snapanaṃ ca te // SkP_26.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2739: purastādbhojayiṣye te putre jāte na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_26.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2741: sadā sattraṃ ca pūjāṃ ca kariṣyati tava prabho // SkP_26.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2743: sā tamuktvā tathā vyāsa tasthau niyamamāsthitā /
GP12skp031pu:2744: sopavāsā tadā pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tasya kurvatī // SkP_26.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2745: tāṃ tathā tiṣṭhatīṃ devaḥ provāca sa gaṇeśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2746: uttiṣṭha nāsti te putro mā khedaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2749: tato narādhipaṃ devī provāca vimanā tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2750: āryaputra na me putraṃ gaṇapo 'sau prayacchati /
GP12skp031pu:2751: bravīti nāsti te putro mā vṛthā niyamaṃ kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2753: evaṃ mahiṣyā sa proktaḥ svayameva narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2756: mā sthā vṛtheha nṛpate na te putraṃ dadāmyaham // SkP_26.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2760: gaṇo vā tvaṃ piśāco vā bhūto vā rākṣaso 'pi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2761: kṛtaghnastvaṃ na saṃdeho na tvaṃ pūjāmihārhasi // SkP_26.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2763: viṣaye mama vāsī ca na ca putraṃ prayacchasi // SkP_26.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2764: pūjārho na bhavāṃstasmān matto daṇḍaṃ tvamarhasi /
GP12skp031pu:2767: sthaṇḍilaṃ ca babhañjāśu dadāhārcāṃ ca suprabhām // SkP_26.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2768: nikumbho 'pi kṛtārthaḥ sann ākāśe saṃsthitaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2769: uvāca taṃ divodāsaṃ pradahanniva tejasā // SkP_26.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2771: na datto yadyasau kopaḥ kastatra bhavato 'bhavat // SkP_26.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2773: tasmādvarṣasahasraṃ te purī śūnyā bhaviṣyati // SkP_26.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2776: deveśāya nivedyaivaṃ tasthau pārśvagataḥ prabhoḥ // SkP_26.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2777: rājāpi tasya vākyena tathyenārthena caiva hi /
GP12skp031pu:2779: atha sā tena śāpena purī vārāṇasī tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2781: tāṃ tu śūnyāṃ sa vijñāya devyā saha pinākadhṛk /
GP12skp031pu:2782: sagaṇo nandinā sārdham ājagāma mahādyutiḥ // SkP_26.64 //
GP12skp031pu:2783: sa tatra mānasaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ sūryavarcasam /
GP12skp031pu:2786: etāvacchakyate vaktum anaupamyaguṇaṃ hi tat // SkP_26.66 //
GP12skp031pu:2790: reme navendīvaraphullanetrā devī na sasmāra vacaśca mātuḥ // SkP_26.68 //
GP12skp031pu:2799: kathayaitanmama vibho yattvāṃ pṛcchāmi mānada // SkP_27.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2800: kiṃ phalaṃ tava deveśa labhante bhaktavatsala /
GP12skp031pu:2801: bhaktā ye phalamuddiśya kurvate tava kiṃcana // SkP_27.4 //
GP12skp031pu:2810: yathoktavānmayi brahmaṃs tathā tatkathayāmi te // SkP_27.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2814: tanme brūhi yathātattvaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // SkP_27.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2817: devadevena pārvatyā yatpurā kathitaṃ hitam // SkP_27.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2820: hitāya devi bhaktānāṃ pṛṣṭaste kathayāmi te // SkP_27.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2821: prāsādaṃ yastu me devi śubhraṃ kuryādanindite /
GP12skp031pu:2823: vidhānena yathoktena liṅgaṃ me sthāpayecca yaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2824: carate sa mayā sārdhaṃ nityamaṣṭaguṇānvitaḥ // SkP_27.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2825: kāñcanaṃ tuṭimātraṃ vā yo dadyādbahu vā mama /
GP12skp031pu:2826: tasya haimavate śṛṅge dadāni gṛhamuttamam // SkP_27.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2827: yo me gāstu hiraṇyaṃ vā dadyādavimanāḥ priye /
GP12skp031pu:2829: vṛṣabhaṃ yaḥ prayaccheta śvetaṃ nīlamathāpi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2832: sa me puraṃ samāsādya gaṇeśaiḥ saha modate // SkP_27.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2833: yo me puṇyaphalaṃ dadyād ātmanā pūrvamārjitam /
GP12skp031pu:2836: rathena vṛṣayuktena mama loke sa modate // SkP_27.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2838: dadāni brahmaṇo loke vāsaṃ tasya supūjitam // SkP_27.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2840: aśakto nāsti ca dravyaṃ yasya nityaṃ sumadhyame // SkP_27.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2841: sa tayā śraddhayā pūto vimuktaḥ sarvapātakaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2842: mama lokamavāpnoti bhinne dehe na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_27.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2844: sa mitraṃ yakṣarājasya yakṣo bhavati vīryavān // SkP_27.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2846: gandhāśca daśasāhasrā ānantyaṃ cārcanaṃ smṛtam // SkP_27.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2848: gandhodakaṃ pañcaśataṃ pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_27.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2850: tasmācca sarpiṣā snānaṃ bhūyaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā // SkP_27.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2857: dve sahasre palānāṃ tu mahiṣākṣasya yo dahet /
GP12skp031pu:2858: devi saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2859: dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu yo mūrtau pāyasaṃ saghṛtaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2860: nivedayedvarṣamekaṃ sa ca nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2862: śeṣāśca caravaḥ sarve yāvakārdhena saṃmitāḥ // SkP_27.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2864: prīṇāti ca pitṝnsarvān vimāne caiva modate /
GP12skp031pu:2865: chattraṃ dadyācca yaḥ so 'pi dīpyate tejasā divi // SkP_27.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2868: dadānyasya svakaṃ lokaṃ tuṣṭo 'haṃ devi śāśvatam // SkP_27.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2870: pūjito 'haṃ sadā bhaktyā putratve kalpayāmi tam // SkP_27.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2871: ekarātraṃ ca yo martyo dīpaṃ dhārayati sthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2872: sarvayajñaphalaṃ tasya dadāni śriyameva ca // SkP_27.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2874: na māṃ paśyanti rāgāndhās tamasā bahulīkṛtāḥ // SkP_27.37 //
GP12skp031pu:2876: ekāgramanaso dāntās te māṃ paśyanti nityadā // SkP_27.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2877: ye me bhaktāḥ sadā caiva sāṃkhyayogaviśāradāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2878: sarvaṃ paśyanti ca mayi māṃ ca sarvatra yogataḥ // SkP_27.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2880: gacchanti mama te lokaṃ tamo bhittvā sudurbhidam // SkP_27.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2882: dhyānino nityayuktāśca devi paśyanti māṃ budhāḥ // SkP_27.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2884: pādayostāni suśroṇi sadā saṃnihitāni me // SkP_27.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2886: mamaiva sa prabhāvena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // SkP_27.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2887: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi devi yo māṃ sadā smaret /
GP12skp031pu:2888: kalmaṣeṇa na yujyeta naraḥ kartā kadācana // SkP_27.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2890: yo 'bhyarcayati māṃ nityaṃ sa mamātmasamo bhavet // SkP_27.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2891: ṣaḍaṅgena ca yogena yo māmarcayate sadā /
GP12skp031pu:2892: praviśeta sa māṃ kṣipram atra nāsti vicāraṇā // SkP_27.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2894: so 'pi madgatamanā madarpaṇo yāti devi gatimapratarkitām // SkP_27.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2898: tato vyāsa punardevī patiṃ vratapatiṃ śubhā /
GP12skp031pu:2901: vrataṃ bhavati yādṛgvā tatprabrūhi maheśvara // SkP_28.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2908: taccaiva phalamāpnoti yamaṃ caiva na paśyati // SkP_28.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2910: sa tapyatyā nakhāgrebhyo nityaṃ yo māṃ samāśritaḥ // SkP_28.6 //
GP12skp031pu:2913: pṛthivībhājane bhuṅkte nityaṃ parvasu yo naraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2914: sa trirātraphalaṃ devi ahorātreṇa vindati // SkP_28.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2915: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yo bhuṅkte nityameva hyatandritaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2918: yo bhuṅkte devi naiteṣu saṃyatastu naraḥ samām // SkP_28.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2920: bhūtānāṃ dayitaścaiva divyaṃ rūpaṃ bibharti ca // SkP_28.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2924: sa vai varṣasahasrāṇi dviṣaṣṭiṃ divi modate /
GP12skp031pu:2925: divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān devataiḥ saha nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2931: candanaṃ caiva dadyādvai yathāsaṃkhyena pūjitam // SkP_28.16 //
GP12skp031pu:2935: iha loke sukhī jāto māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2936: ratnāvaliṃ tu yo dadyād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo 'tha viṭ /
GP12skp031pu:2937: śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke matsaukhyaṃ prāpnute param // SkP_28.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2941: manvantaraṃ ca goloke gokanyābhiḥ sa pūjyate // SkP_28.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2942: sarve devāstathā viṣṇur brahmā ṛṣaya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2943: kurvantyarghe hi sāṃnidhyaṃ tebhyastadviddhi niḥsṛtam // SkP_28.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2944: guhyametatparaṃ devi yo vetti sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2947: kṣīreṇa yo māṃ satataṃ snāpayeta trirudyataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2950: mānasasya ca jāpyasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2951: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kṣīreṇa snapanaṃ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2952: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate vallabhatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2954: dvisāhasrasya jāpyasya mānasasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2956: niṣkāṇāṃ ca suvarṇasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2958: vitarāmi śubhaṃ lokaṃ nityaṃ tasya dhruvaṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:2959: sarvalokakṣaye tasya na kṣayo bhavatīśvari // SkP_28.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2960: liṅgapūjāṃ tu yaḥ kuryān mama devi dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2961: śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divyāni divi modate // SkP_28.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2963: arkasya karavīrasya bilvasya ca bukasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:2964: suvarṇaniṣkaṃ puṣpe tu sarvasminneva kathyate // SkP_28.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2966: ekasminkaravīrasya datte puṣpe hi tatphalam // SkP_28.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2968: tadekasya tu padmasya dattasya phalamucyate // SkP_28.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2969: padmānāṃ tu sahasrasya mama dattasya yatphalam /
GP12skp031pu:2970: tatphalaṃ labhate pattre datte bilvasya śobhane // SkP_28.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2971: bilvapattrasahasre tu datte me yatphalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12skp031pu:2972: bukapuṣpe tadekasmin mama datte labhetphalam // SkP_28.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2974: puṣpe datte tadekasmiṃl labheddhuttūrakasya tu // SkP_28.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2975: nirmālyaṃ yo hi me nityaṃ śirasā dhārayiṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:2978: narake sa patedghore tiryagyonau ca sambhavet // SkP_28.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2980: tasya pāpamahaṃ śīghraṃ nāśayāmi mahāvrate // SkP_28.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2981: dīpamālāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kārttike māsi vai mama /
GP12skp031pu:2983: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate dīpyate ca raviryathā // SkP_28.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2985: yo me devi sadā mūrdhni sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_28.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2986: ye hi siddhārthakāḥ proktās tathā kṛṣṇatilāśca ye /
GP12skp031pu:2987: sarve te tvanmayā devi guhyametanmayeritam // SkP_28.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2988: citro nāma gaṇo mahyaṃ tena sārdhaṃ sa modate /
GP12skp031pu:2990: tyaktvā sarvāṇi duḥkhāni māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2994: sa prayāti divaṃ devi liṅgaṃ yo 'rcayatīha me // SkP_28.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2999: apṛcchatpuṣpyamāṇāsyā kena tvaṃ deva tuṣyasi // SkP_28.47 //
GP12skp031pu:3001: vacaḥ provāca bhagavāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // SkP_28.48 //
GP12skp031pu:3003: śṛṇu devi yathātattvaṃ yena yānti śubhāṃ gatim /
GP12skp031pu:3004: trailokye jantavaḥ sarve madbhaktā ye śubhānane // SkP_28.49 //
GP12skp031pu:3006: yo hi tattvena tadveda saṃsārādvipramucyate // SkP_28.50 //
GP12skp031pu:3007: na ca prakāśayedguhyaṃ nāma te kīrtayennaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3010: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca samprāpya rudraloke mahīyate // SkP_28.52 //
GP12skp031pu:3012: mantreṇa vidhivaccaiva tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // SkP_28.53 //
GP12skp031pu:3015: namo bhagavate caiva guhyāguhyāya vai sadā // SkP_28.54 //
GP12skp031pu:3017: sarvaguhyāya vai svāhā devaguhyamayāya ca // SkP_28.55 //
GP12skp031pu:3018: sarvaguhyamayo mantraḥ svāhā somāya caiva ha /
GP12skp031pu:3019: kaṭaṃkaṭāya vai svāhā svāhā devāya śuṣmiṇe // SkP_28.56 //
GP12skp031pu:3020: puṣpāṇyetena mantreṇa yo me nityaṃ nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:3021: sahasraṃ tena jāpyasya mānasasya kṛtaṃ bhavet // SkP_28.57 //
GP12skp031pu:3023: tilānāṃ caiva kṛṣṇānāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pārvati /
GP12skp031pu:3025: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ brūyāt sūryeti ca mameti ca /
GP12skp031pu:3027: arcayitvā ca māṃ devi yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:3029: so 'pi devi prapaśyenmāṃ viyoniṃ na sa gacchati // SkP_28.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3030: vāmadeva sudeveti hara gupteti vā punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3031: umāpate nīlakaṇṭha śānta śrīkaṇṭha gopate // SkP_28.61 //
GP12skp031pu:3032: śarva bhīma paśupate śaṃkarogra bhaveti ca /
GP12skp031pu:3034: sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta divi devaiśca pūjyate // SkP_28.62 //
GP12skp031pu:3038: amāvāsyāṃ tu yo nityaṃ saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ dahet /
GP12skp031pu:3041: idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ yo me devi nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:3044: imāni ca mahābhāge yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:3051: mahādevo mahādevo mahādeveti caiva hi // SkP_28.69 //
GP12skp031pu:3053: sa dehabhedamāsādya yogātmā gaṇapo bhavet // SkP_28.70 //
GP12skp031pu:3058: pūtaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12skp031pu:3059: śrotavyaṃ na ca sarveṇa tathā deyaṃ na kasyacit // SkP_28.72 //
GP12skp031pu:3064: jagataḥ pitarau devau cakratuḥ kimataḥ param // SkP_29.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3066: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo devīṃ himavataḥ sutām /
GP12skp031pu:3067: uvāca devi paśyāma udyānaṃ yadi rocate // SkP_29.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3069: evaṃ bhavatu deveśa yathāttha tvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12skp031pu:3070: na hi me 'nyatra gantavyam udyānātparato hara // SkP_29.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3072: saha devyā tato vyāsa vārāṇasyāṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3080: saṃyuktaṃ sarvataḥ śrīmad vanaṃ vaibhrājasaṃnibham // SkP_29.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3082: asmindeśe purā devi tiṣṭhato mama śobhane // SkP_29.8 //
GP12skp031pu:3084: pīyatīnāṃ payo vegāt phenaṃ mūrdhni samāpatat // SkP_29.9 //
GP12skp031pu:3091: āśritaḥ soma āgatya saha gobhirna tāstyajat // SkP_29.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3094: na naśyanti yathā sadyas tathā sarvasurārcita // SkP_29.13 //
GP12skp031pu:3096: goprekṣaka iti khyātaḥ saṃstutaḥ sarvadevataiḥ // SkP_29.14 //
GP12skp031pu:3103: sāṃnidhyaṃ kṛtavāndevi sa cāyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sthitaḥ // SkP_29.17 //
GP12skp031pu:3107: labhate dehabhede tu gaṇatvaṃ cātidurlabham // SkP_29.19 //
GP12skp031pu:3108: asminnapi pradeśe tu tā gāvo brahmaṇā svayam /

GP12skp031pu:3535: vinatāyai tathā lakṣmyai surasāyai namo namaḥ /

GP12skp031pu:3539: ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ naraḥ strī vā samāhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3540: sa rātriṣu kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tyajetsarvamaśeṣataḥ // SkP_29.213 //
GP12skp031pu:3541: śayāno japate yaśca prayato vyāsa nityaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3542: divākṛtaṃ sa jahyāttu mṛtaśca sugatiṃ vrajet // SkP_29.214 //
GP12skp031pu:3551: sa bhūtvānucaro devyāḥ puṇye loke mahīyate // SkP_29.218 //
GP12skp031pu:3553: tābhirevaṃ stutā devī sthitā devasya saṃnidhau /
GP12skp031pu:3556: yaccāpi parayā bhaktyā māṃ prapannāḥ stha śobhanāḥ // SkP_29.220 //
GP12skp031pu:3560: sarvaṃ dāsyāmi tadvo 'haṃ mā cirāya taducyatām // SkP_29.222 //
GP12skp031pu:3562: devi puṃsāṃ striyaḥ sarvāḥ kāryārthaṃ viditaṃ ca te /
GP12skp031pu:3564: samāpte caiva tatkārye parā iva bhavanti naḥ // SkP_29.223 //
GP12skp031pu:3565: taddevi yadi tuṣṭāsi yadi deyo varaśca naḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3566: sarvastrīṇāṃ mahādevi bhavantu puruṣā vaśāḥ // SkP_29.224 //
GP12skp031pu:3569: sarve vaśyā bhaviṣyanti sarvakāryakarāśca ha // SkP_29.225 //
GP12skp031pu:3570: ādau paścācca sarvābhyo hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3571: sarvabhogāṃśca dāsyantu vaśagāḥ sarvathāpi ca // SkP_29.226 //
GP12skp031pu:3573: priyā eva bhaviṣyanti pāpaṃ na ca bhavetsadā // SkP_29.227 //
GP12skp031pu:3577: naiva drakṣyanti te puṃso madvarānmohitendriyāḥ // SkP_29.229 //
GP12skp031pu:3579: tataḥ sā devadevasya patnī himavataḥ sutā /
GP12skp031pu:3581: bhava nārya iti prāha hasantī priyamavyayā // SkP_29.230 //
GP12skp031pu:3588: narāḥ sarve ca yuṣmāsu bhaviṣyanti sadā ratāḥ // SkP_29.233 //
GP12skp031pu:3589: vṛttiḥ śubhā bhavitrī ca sarvāsāṃ mama tejasā /
GP12skp031pu:3590: puṃsāṃ strībhogasiddhyarthaṃ strīṇāṃ ratyarthameva ca // SkP_29.234 //
GP12skp031pu:3591: kriyāḥ śubhāṅgasaṃskārā divyā ye mānuṣāśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:3592: bahurūpāśca tā bhūtvā viviśuḥ sarvadāṅganāḥ // SkP_29.235 //
GP12skp031pu:3594: evaṃ devī tadā vyāsa sṛṣṭvā tā vai visṛjya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3595: uvācāpsaraso brūta kiṃ vo bhūyaḥ karomyaham // SkP_29.236 //
GP12skp031pu:3598: tā uvāca tato devī evaṃ loke bhaviṣyatu // SkP_29.237 //
GP12skp031pu:3599: tataḥ sa sahito devyā sanandī parameśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3607: annadatvaṃ ca samprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ mahādyutiḥ // SkP_30.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3608: kṣetrapālaḥ kathaṃ jātaḥ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ gataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3609: etadicchāmi kathitaṃ śrotuṃ brahmasuta tvayā // SkP_30.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3611: śṛṇu vyāsa yathā lebhe gaṇeśatvaṃ sa piṅgalaḥ /

GP12skp031pu:3614: harikeśa iti khyāto brahmaṇyo dhārmikaśca ha // SkP_30.4 //
GP12skp031pu:3620: na tvā putramahaṃ manye durjāto yastvamanyathā // SkP_30.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3624: maivaṃ kārṣīrna no vṛttir evaṃ dṛṣṭā mahātmanām /
GP12skp031pu:3625: svayambhuvā yathā sṛṣṭā saiva vṛttiḥ praśasyate // SkP_30.9 //
GP12skp031pu:3627: duṣṭā caivāpraśastā ca garhitā sādhubhiḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:3628: vṛttiḥ svayambhuvā sṛṣṭā tyaktavyā yadi no bhavet /
GP12skp031pu:3631: devatvaṃ no vimārgeyur mānuṣyāṃ jātimeva ca // SkP_30.11 //
GP12skp031pu:3633: mamāpi vihitaṃ paśya karmaitannātra saṃśayaḥ // SkP_30.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3636: uvāca niṣkrama kṣipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ yatra rocate // SkP_30.13 //
GP12skp031pu:3649: kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me /
GP12skp031pu:3653: nirjagāma ca deveśaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3654: udyānaṃ darśayāmāsa devyā devaḥ pinākadhṛk // SkP_30.22 //
GP12skp031pu:3656: virūḍhapuṣpaiḥ paritaḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ kaṇṭakitaiśca ketakaiḥ // SkP_30.23 //
GP12skp031pu:3678: rātrau candrasya bhāsā kusumitatilakairekatāṃ samprayātaṃ chāyāsuptaprabuddhasthitahariṇakulāluptadarbhāṅkurāgram // SkP_30.34 //
GP12skp031pu:3680: māyūraiḥ pakṣacandraiḥ kvacidapi patitai rañjitakṣmāpradeśaṃ deśe deśe nilīnapramuditavilasanmattahārītavṛndam // SkP_30.35 //
GP12skp031pu:3682: hṛṣṭābhiḥ kvacidapi kiṃnarāṅganābhiḥ kṣīvābhiḥ sumadhuragītavṛkṣaṣaṇḍam // SkP_30.36 //

GP12skp031pu:3711: rocate me sadāvāso yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu // SkP_30.49 //
GP12skp031pu:3713: yathā mokṣamihāpnoti anyatra na tathā kvacit // SkP_30.50 //

GP12skp031pu:3717: vimuktaṃ na mayā yasmān mokṣyate vā kadācana /
GP12skp031pu:3718: mama kṣetramidaṃ tasmād avimuktamiti smṛtam // SkP_30.52 //
GP12skp031pu:3721: iha samprāpyate yena tata etadviśiṣyate // SkP_30.53 //
GP12skp031pu:3722: prayāge vā bhavenmokṣa iha vā matparigrahāt /
GP12skp031pu:3724: jaigīṣavyaḥ parāṃ siddhiṃ yo gataḥ sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3725: asya kṣetrasya māhātmyād bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ // SkP_30.55 //

GP12skp031pu:3730: iha samprāpyate mokṣo durlabho 'nyatra karhicit // SkP_30.57 //
GP12skp031pu:3732: ātmanaścaiva sāyujyam īpsitaṃ sthānameva ca // SkP_30.58 //
GP12skp031pu:3735: saṃvarto bhavitā yaśca so 'pi bhaktyā mamaiva tu /
GP12skp031pu:3736: ihaivārādhya māṃ devi siddhiṃ yāsyatyanuttamām // SkP_30.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3742: upāsate mahātmānaḥ sarve māmiha suvrate // SkP_30.62 //
GP12skp031pu:3743: anye ca yoginaḥ siddhāś channarūpā mahāvrate /
GP12skp031pu:3747: sphītāṃ janapadākīrṇāṃ bhuktvā ca suciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3753: iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ so 'pi saṃsāraṃ na punarviśet // SkP_30.67 //
GP12skp031pu:3755: vratinaśca nirārambhāḥ sarvato mayi bhāvitāḥ // SkP_30.68 //
GP12skp031pu:3757: gatā eva paraṃ mokṣaṃ prasādānmama suvrate // SkP_30.69 //
GP12skp031pu:3761: avimuktasya kathitaṃ mayā te guhyamuttamam // SkP_30.71 //
GP12skp031pu:3763: etadbudhyanti yogajñā ye ca yogīśvarā bhuvi // SkP_30.72 //
GP12skp031pu:3764: etadeva paraṃ jñānam etadeva paraṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:3765: etadeva paraṃ brahma etadeva paraṃ padam // SkP_30.73 //
GP12skp031pu:3766: vārāṇasīti bhuvanatrayasārabhūtā ramyā purī mama sadā girirājaputri /
GP12skp031pu:3767: atrāgatā vividhaduṣkṛtakāriṇo 'pi pāpakṣayādvirajasaḥ pratibhānti martyāḥ // SkP_30.74 //
GP12skp031pu:3768: etatsmṛtaṃ priyatamaṃ mama devi nityaṃ kṣetraṃ vicitratarugulmanikāmapuṣpam /

GP12skp031pu:3790: uvāca sa tadā yakṣo varado 'smīti coditaḥ /
